page.title: 11FAMILY SUNDAYS
page.content: Mummy usually wakes me up about 8.30. We have breakfast and there's a normal rush to get ready for Sunday School. When that is finished we go into the Church Service. After we come home I read. We have lunch about 1pm. It is usually meat, potatoes, gravy and vegetables, followed by ice-cream and chocolate sauce. In the afternoon we go for a walk. After tea we go to Church again. Then we go to bed.{ {Katie Grimwade(9)} I wake about 7.30 and I read. Later I listen quietly to some records. About 9 am Dad gets up and makes Mum's breakfast of tea and toast then ours of bacon and eggs. In summer time, we pick fruit - strawberries and raspberries, but hardly ever gooseberries. After lunch I watch Grandstand then Dad and I play cricket.{Tom Clayton(9)}
